steps: Key ON (no start), hold UP+DOWN 3s on platform; use DATA/ENTER to scroll codes.
From ground, press MENU then DIAG; read last 5 codes; note hours.
GS: Hold UP & DOWN then power ON; 7-segment shows last code.
Handset via CAN port under platform; menu DIAGNOSTICS → FAULTS.
IG ON; press and hold DIAG then power; read E-codes on dash.
Use dash menu → Diagnostics → Active/Stored; confirm with OK.
Service menu: Key ON, press Info 5s; navigate to DTCs.
